ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, atsɔ́ nò gie peg ge gíŋe ŋweʼe mbwó pi, lélɔg shwóŋo gẅí lyɛ̌ʼ kà pɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ gie mɔɔn menò ge láʼ cʉate wɔ́ɔ, á té wó wɔ́.
en: About the times and the seasons:   Brothers and sisters, you do not need anything to be written to you.

ngiemboon: Á nue pi ne ńcwoŋo ńzsé gí ngie lyɛʼɛ́ láʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge láʼ vege vege tó páʼ ntsǒŋ gẅie à tóo letsẅɛ́ʼ la.
en: For you yourselves know very well that the day of the Lord   will come just like a thief  # 5:2 Jn 10:1 in the night.

ngiemboon: Pʉ̀a mesoŋ ge láʼ gwɔ́ tà ne gɔɔn ngie: «Mbʉ́lè ee tsɛ̀ɛ láʼ, pɔ́ té gíŋe ne ńcÿɔʼɔ wɔ́,» tá máamáa ngɔ́ʼ leen ńké ńtóo na pɔ́b páʼ múɔ neŋé tà ńgwoon manzwě shwoŋ la. Atsɔ̌ wɔb á le lÿɔ́ʼte tà ńtsẅɛ́ wɔ́.
en: When they say, “Peace and security,” then sudden destruction   will come upon them, like labor pains on a pregnant woman, and they will not escape.

ngiemboon: Tá ńgʉa na pi mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, mbà pi te nyé ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ nzěm wɔ́, á na ntí gie yɛ̌ lyɛʼɛ́ láʼ ge tóo na pi pɔ́ páʼ ntsǒŋ wɔ́.
en: But you, brothers and sisters, are not in the dark, for this day to surprise you like a thief.

ngiemboon: Pi metsèm zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ pʉ̀a pie é giŋe na jʉʼ gie áa ye kyɛ̀ʼ, ńgwɔ́ pʉ̀a pie é giŋe pɔ́ zsǒ. Pege te pʉ̀a pie é giŋe tsẅɛ́ʼ wɔ́, ńké te pʉ̀a pie é giŋe lé nzěm wɔ́.
en: For you are all children of light and children of the day. We do not belong to the night or the darkness.

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, tà pege lyé páʼ petsɔ́ pʉ̀a. Tà pege gwáʼa lÿɔ̀g ńdyé, pege jÿó mmó à kuʼ kuʼ.
en: So then, let us not sleep, like the rest, but let us stay awake and be self-controlled.

ngiemboon: Palyé lelɔ́g lyé letsẅɛ́ʼ, panú melùʼ tà ḿbʉ́a, nú pɔ́ letsẅɛ́ʼ.
en: For those who sleep, sleep at night, and those who get drunk, get drunk at night.

ngiemboon: Tá ńgʉa na pege pie pege giŋe fʉ̀ʼʉ zso, mbà á ne ńzɛ́te ngie pege jÿó mmó à kuʼ kuʼ, nkwòŋe mbɔɔ lézáb ntʉ́m na Ssé e gwɔ́ yege nzsǒ ncù gie mé lɔgɔ tʉ̌ ńnyɛte. Lézẅiʼte lyɛ̌ʼ gie e Ssé ge gÿo pege tsẅɛ́, à gwɔ́ yégè cÿɔ̀ʼɔ ncù gie mé lɔgɔ tʉ̌ ńnyɛte.
en: But since we belong to the day, let us be self-controlled   and put on the armor  # 5:8 Eph 6:14; Rv 9:9,17 of faith and love, and a helmet  # 5:8 1Sm 17:5,38; Ps 60:7; 108:8; Is 59:17; Eph 6:17 of the hope of salvation.

ngiemboon: E Ssé la zɔɔn te tsɔ́ʼɔ wégè pɔ́ légyáŋa lóŋ na pege, pege gyá ngɔ́ʼ wɔ́, à la tsɔ́ʼɔ wégè pɔ́ légÿo pege cʉa nzèm Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto ńgẅiin letsẅɛ́.
en: For God did not appoint us to wrath, but to obtain salvation through our Lord   Jesus Christ,  # 5:9 Ac 15:26

ngiemboon: À la kwé na twó ségè, légwɔ́ gie pege lɔɔn fó ńkwé mbɔɔ kwě, kà ńnyé pɔ́ ntʉ̀ntʉ̀ wɔ́ɔ, mbà peg lâ pɔ̌ zɔɔ púʼu, ńgwɔ́.
en: who died for us,   so that whether we are awake or asleep,  # 5:10 1Th 5:6 we may live together with him.  # 5:10 Lk 20:38; Php 1:23

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, pi kẅiŋte mennɛ́ mí pi né pi, pi sele ńtóonte mennɛ́ mí pi né pi, páʼ pi ne ńgÿo púʼu lɛ̂.
en: Therefore encourage one another and build each other up as you are already doing.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, peg sẅiŋté gẅí ngie pi ná mekùʼ mbwó pʉ̀a pie é faʼa fàʼa Ssé tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, á mbwó pʉ̀a pie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la tÿɔ́gɔ wɔ́b á mvfò pi ngie pɔ́ tÿɔ́gte gẅí.
en: Now we ask you, brothers and sisters, to give recognition   to those who labor among you and lead you  # 5:12 Or care for you in the Lord and admonish you,

ngiemboon: Pi gÿo mekùʼ mɔ́b mboŋó, ńkwoŋo wɔ́b tɛʼ, ńtí twó fàʼ gie pɔ́ ée mǒ, ḿbɔ́ɔn cÿɔ́g tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi.
en: and to regard them very highly in love because of their work. Be at peace   among yourselves.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, peg ne sẅíŋte gẅí ngie pi tÿɔ́gte melǒŋ, ńkẅiŋte pʉ̀a pie ntʉ́m wɔ́b nyé ḿvɛɛ vɛ, ńtóonte pʉ̀a pie é nyé pɔ́ te tʉte, ńgẅiin pɔ́ kwɔ̀gɔnnɛ́ nzèm wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ.
en: And we exhort you, brothers and sisters:   warn those who are idle,  # 5:14 Or who are disorderly, or who are undisciplined comfort the discouraged, help the weak, be patient  # 5:14 Mt 18:26,29; Lk 18:7; 1Co 13:4; Heb 6:15; Jms 5:7–8; 2Pt 3:9 with everyone.

ngiemboon: Pi pɔ́ɔn lélɔgɔ nò tepòŋ ńtsɔ́ʼɔ nò tepòŋ. Pi gÿo pɔ́ nò mbòŋo tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi té tyɛ̀ʼte.
en: See to it that no one repays evil for evil   to anyone,  # 5:15 Lk 7:47 but always pursue what is good for one another and for all.  # 5:15 Rm 12:9; Gl 6:10; 1Th 5:21

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńkága kǎg fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm.
en: Rejoice   always,

ngiemboon: Pi ne ńtsyɛʼte Ssé fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm,
en: pray constantly,

ngiemboon: ńne ńnáa ndǎg mbwó ye na kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ. Áa mmó gie e Ssé kwoŋ ngie pi pie pi lâ Yěsô Keleto léen ńcʉ́ʼʉ tàʼ nyìŋ la, pi ne ńgÿo.
en: give thanks in everything; for this is God’s will   for you in Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: Tà pi tɔʼɔ Zẅìge Ssé léfaʼa fàʼ.
en: Don’t stifle the Spirit.

ngiemboon: Tà pi gwága shwóŋè pʉ̀a pie é néŋe ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ gẅie é fóo mbwó Ssé,
en: Don’t despise prophecies,

ngiemboon: ńgʉa na kɔ́ wɔ́ɔ, ńtsaʼ ḿbí pɔ́ yembòŋo,
en: but test all things.   Hold on to what is good.

ngiemboon: ḿbú ńkÿo nò tepòŋ ntsèm.
en: Stay away   from every kind of evil.

ngiemboon: Peg ne ńdúɔ ngie e Ssé lé twó yé, gẅie aa ngàŋ mbʉ́lè, à gÿo pi gwɔ́ pʉ̀a pé tà ńcʉ́me, ngie à pyɛ́bɛ zẅìge gí, ḿbyɛ́b ntʉ́m gẅí, ḿbyɛ́b mbùm gi, à gÿo ńgwɔ́ lyɛ̌ʼ gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto ge gÿo tó, pi gwɔ́ té sɔɔn lɔ̌ʼ na pi.
en: Now may the God of peace   himself sanctify you completely. And may your whole spirit,  # 5:23 Ps 51:12 soul, and body be kept sound and blameless at the coming  # 5:23 1Th 1:10 of our Lord  # 5:23 Rv 11:8 Jesus Christ.  # 5:23 1Jn 2:28

ngiemboon: E Ssé gie e la tsɔ́ʼɔ gẅí, pi cʉ́ʼ pʉ̀a pé, e ge gÿo à gwɔ́ púʼu, á nue à te kúbe.
en: He who calls   you  # 5:24 1Pt 1:15 is faithful; he will do it.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, pi sẅíŋte Ssé mbɔɔ na ség twó.
en: Brothers and sisters, pray for us also.

ngiemboon: Pi tsyɛʼte mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌ metsèm, ńcʉ́ʼʉ létsyɛʼte éfaŋte mennɛ́ mí na ntí ye pʉ̀a Ssé.
en: Greet all the brothers and sisters with a holy kiss.

ngiemboon: Á na lezíŋ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, n gɔɔn né pi ngie pi tóŋo yɔɔn ŋwàʼne á mvfò pʉ̀a Ssé metsèm.
en: I charge you by the Lord that this letter be read to all the brothers and sisters.

ngiemboon: Á poŋ ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto ne ńcÿó gʉm gí!
en: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
